dict.acceptation: 健康状况；卫生；保健；昌盛，兴旺；

sent.orig: The new Pfizer has three business segments: health care, animal health and consumer health care.
sent.trans: 新辉瑞公司包括三个业务领域：医药保舰动物保舰以及消费者保健品。

sent.orig: Jane: Yeah, It'says they have health club health farm and a health spa.
sent.trans: 简：上面说他们有健身房，健身村和健身温泉疗养地。

sent.orig: A health certificate and other health documents will be passed on to Health Care Division.
sent.trans: 健康证明书其他健康证明文件应转送卫生保健组审查。

sent.orig: The second chapter describes the mental health standards and mental health standards.
sent.trans: 第二章，介绍了心理健康的标准及大学生心理健康的标准。

sent.orig: I judged your health from your laughter, and think you are in good health.
sent.trans: 我通过你的笑声来判断你的身体状况，并认为你身体很好。
